import React from 'react' const Header = (props) => ( //rendering name of course

{props.course}

) const Part = (props) => (

{props.content}

) const Content = (props) => ( //rendering parts and number of exercises

{props.content}

) const Total = (props) => ( //renders total number of exercises

{props.total}

) const App = () => { //All data still resides in the App component, //which passes the necessary data to each component using props. const course = 'Half Stack application development' const part1 = 'Fundamentals of React' const exercises1 = 10 const part2 = 'Using props to pass data' const exercises2 = 7 const part3 = 'State of a component' const exercises3 = 14 return (
) } export default App
